remarks: Properties which determine the least upper bound in a poset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.)
statement:
poslubdg.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
poslubdg.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
poslubdg.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( lub ` K ) ) $.
poslubdg.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. Poset ) $.
poslubdg.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
poslubdg.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. B ) $.
poslubdg.ub $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> x .<_ T ) $.
poslubdg.le $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. B /\ A. x e. S x .<_ y ) -> T .<_ y ) $.
poslubdg $p |- ( ph -> ( U ` S ) = T ) $.
$d .<_ x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d ph x y $.
